page.title: 13VANDALS
page.content: Vandals are pathetic, they smash windows, write on walls and to top it all they use stupid words because they can't think of any good and useful things to say. They spoil childrens education by smashing windows which Kirklees have to pay for. With the money the schools could have at least a computer for each form. On the whole Kirklees spend more on vandals than they do on text books and other things which are important to a school. If they wanted a good education they wouldn't do it at all and if their parents knew they'd do something (well I know mine would). They should put more posters up about vandals so they'd understand it's wrong. Secondly they should have a policeman in nearly every area where there are mindless people. { VANDALS ARE MINDLESS
